content: mermaid socks a fun sock pattern from the cuff down using the magic loop method written by kieron pegg materials needed ● 100 grams of sock yarn ○ i used gründl wolle hot socks malcesine in colourway 8 ● 1 2 25mm 100cm/ us1 - 40 circular knitting needle ● gauge tool/ ruler/tape measure ● yarn needle gauge and sizing this pattern includes three sizes s m l for these socks 8/9 stitches per inch is great if this gauge is met the s small size should fit children m size for women and the l size fitting average men s feet abbreviations k - knit p - purl w&t - wrap and turn - i have included links for how to work w&t in the heel instructions ssk - slip slip knit slip 1 stitch as if to knit slip 1 stitch as to knit knit the two stitches together off the right hand needle k2tog - knit two together skills needed to work the pattern to work this sock pattern you will need to have an understanding of how to work the knit and purl stitch this pattern is written for magic loop i will link to a very good video for how to start magic loop if you are unsure of how to do this you will need to know how to do a wrap and turn and the kitchener stitch again i will include links for how to do this mermaid texture round 1 knit all stitches round 2 knit 1 purl 1 - repeat across the cuff link for how to knit magic loop https //www youtube com/watch v=q7p2c5imsnc using the long tail cast on or your favourite stretchy cast on cast on 56 64 72 stitches once the stitches have been divided in two you will have 28 32 36 stitches on each needle join to work in the round you will not need a stitch marker to mark the start of the round your yarn tail will mark the start of the round because this pattern is magic loop the stitches will be divided over two needles when you are at the start of a round the needle tip at the front of the sock will be needle 1/instep stitches and the needle at the back of the sock will be needle 2/heel stitches work in 2x2 rib as follows - knit 2 purl 2 - repeat across sock for my socks i like 2 of ribbing which is about 20-25 rounds for me leg for the leg section you will work the mermaid stitch texture when i knit my socks i only knit the texture stitch on needle 1 however if you want you can knit the texture on needle 1 and 2 repeat rounds 1-2 of the mermaid texture ending on round 2 for as many rounds as desired for the length of the leg heel for my socks i love the fish lips kiss heel and i will include a
